localResource.name: VM_multiselect
localResource.label: VM multi-select
localResource.queryString: SELECT distinct delete_date, CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN RTrim(cast(vm_name as nvarchar)) ELSE RTrim(cast(vm_name as nvarchar)) + ' (Removed on ' + convert(nvarchar, delete_date, 103) + ')' END as combo_name, vm_id, sort = 0 FROM vm_configuration_view_2_3 Where vm_configuration_view_2_3.cluster_id in (SELECT cluster_configuration_view_2_3.cluster_id FROM cluster_configuration_view_2_3 WHERE cluster_configuration_view_2_3.datacenter_id = $P{P_DataCenter_ID}) AND vm_configuration_view_2_3.cluster_id = CASE $P{P_Cluster_ID} WHEN '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' then vm_configuration_view_2_3.cluster_id ELSE $P{P_Cluster_ID} END AND vm_configuration_view_2_3.vm_type = CASE $P{P_VM_Type} WHEN -1 THEN vm_configuration_view_2_3.vm_type WHEN NULL THEN vm_configuration_view_2_3.vm_type ELSE $P{P_VM_Type} END order by delete_date DESC
